DOC.brief_summary: The primary research question 2 best know dementia caregiver intervention , New York University Caregiver intervention ( NYUCI ) Resources Enhancing Caregivers Health ( REACH OUT ) , effective alleviate depressive symptom caregiver burden among Hispanic caregiver New York City . The investigator hypothesize NYUCI effective REACH OUT reduce caregiver depressive symptom burden among Hispanics focus family-centered counseling , posit important among Hispanic caregiver cultural emphasis among Hispanics family interaction intervention . In order answer primary question , investigator conduct pragmatic randomize trial compare NYUCI vs. REACH OUT 200 Hispanic caregiver person dementia community Northern Manhattan . The total time intervention 6 month . Our research question intervention , NYUCI REACH OUT , good Hispanic relative ( relative ) caregiver person dementia . Our objective obtain effectiveness information help caregiver health provider make decision intervention choose . Our primary aim compare effectiveness implementation NYUCI REACH OUT reduce depressive symptom burden . Our exploratory aim examine compare predictor effectiveness NYUCI REACH OUT examine additional outcome caregiver stress physical health , outcomes related person dementia . METHODS . We conduct pragmatic randomize trial 200 relative caregiver person dementia . Participants randomize NYUCI REACH OUT . The total duration intervention 6 month , assessment baseline follow-up . All intervention questionnaire conduct English Spanish . The study duration 3 year . The primary outcome change caregiver depressive symptom , measure Geriatric Depression Scale , caregiver burden use Zarit caregiver burden interview .
DOC.brief_title: Northern-Manhattan Hispanic Caregiver Intervention Effectiveness Study
